flawed_nl_solution:
900 x 3/4 = <<900*3/4=657.0>>657.0 people came before the start of the concert.
900 - 657.0 = <<900-657.0=243.0>>243.0 people did not come before the start of the concert.
243.0 x 5/9 = <<243.0*5/9=135.0>>135.0 people came few minutes after the first song.
So, 135.0 + 80 = <<135.0+80=215.0>>215.0 people came to the concert that was not able to be at the start of the concert.
Therefore, 243.0 - 215.0 = <<243.0-215.0=28.0>>28.0 people did not go to the concert.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 675.0, not 657.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
